text:
Hi Everyone.
I wanted to know if there is a way to get the deals from the last 60 days using the Deals API. I only managed to get the last 30 days.
anyone ever seen `<!-- Missing Template at Path: 'folder/Page Templates/Home.html' -->`
A bunch of my pages just stopped working for no reason
add a / at the begining of the path maybe?
It should be agnostic to the starting slash
this is super odd.  I’ve got a template in design manager that’s showing live dependents, but when I visit many of the pages I’m getting a blank white screen
then when I inspect element it says missing template path
Hey guys. Do you know how can i get the deals from the last 60 or 70 days. Because on the deals API the only possibility is the last 30 days. But maybe the Beta API has the solution.

I think pop up forms require more user level permissions because this can impact hundreds of pages instead of one.

Right now permissions only have "Forms" access

Wondering about other dev's workflows when building custom pages/websites on the CMS - do you (as a developer) generally create each template as a custom coded template (HTML & HUBL) or do you create Drag and drop as a wrapper and build custom modules within DnD templates? I've been building all my pages from scratch so I can use Bootstrap 4 and just wondering if I should be doing something different.
